[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@liquity/lib-ethers](./lib-ethers.md) &gt; [EthersMosaicConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnectionoptionalparams.md) &gt; [useStore](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md)

## EthersMosaicConnectionOptionalParams.useStore property

Create a [MosaicStore](./lib-base.mosaicstore.md) and expose it as the `store` property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly useStore?: EthersMosaicStoreOption;
```

## Remarks

When set to one of the available [options](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicstoreoption.md)<!-- -->, [ReadableEthersMosaic.connect()](./lib-ethers.readableethersmosaic.connect_1.md) will return a [ReadableEthersMosaicWithStore](./lib-ethers.readableethersmosaicwithstore.md)<!-- -->, while [EthersMosaic.connect()](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaic.connect_1.md) will return an [EthersMosaicWithStore](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicwithstore.md)<!-- -->.

Note that the store won't start monitoring the blockchain until its [start()](./lib-base.mosaicstore.start.md) function is called.
